p: Two highly pathogenic A(H5N1) influenza viruses from chicken and Muscovy duck and one H3 influenza virus from ruddy turnstone and two swine (H1N1) origin influenza viruses possess the PB1-V43I mutation that may result in a high-fidelity RdRp but has not been confirmed ( Cheung et al., 2014). Thus, researchers should consider the possibility of changes in the susceptibility to favipiravir when these types of influenza viruses cause a pandemic.
